```{r teaching_university}
data <- rbind(
  tibble(
    what = "Lecturer - ORH3000: Applied Research Methods in Human Resources Management",
    when = "September 2023 - Present",
    with = "ESG UQAM, Department of Organization and Human Resources",
    where = "Montreal, Quebec, Canada",
    details = c(
      "Taught undergraduate course on research methods (Fall 2023, Winter 2024, Fall 2024)",
      "Achieved high teaching evaluations: 3.93/4 (Fall 2023), 3.88/4 (Winter 2024), 3.89/4 (Fall 2024)"
    )
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Teaching Assistant - Sensibilisation aux pratiques de la psychologie (PSM4300)",
    when = "September 2020 - September 2024",
    with = "Department of Psychology, Université du Québec à Montréal (UQAM)",
    where = "Montreal, QC, Canada",
    details = c("Teaching assistant for the undergraduate course Sensibilisation aux pratiques de la psychologie (introduction to psychological practice and professional issues).")
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Teaching Assistant - Psychologie du travail et des organisations (PSY4706)",
    when = "January 2019 - May 2019",
    with = "Department of Psychology, Université du Québec à Montréal (UQAM)",
    where = "Montreal, QC, Canada",
    details = c("Teaching assistant for the course Psychologie du travail et des organisations (work and organizational psychology).")
  ),
  tibble(
    what = "Teaching Assistant - ADM 9944: Work, Life and Career: Contemporary Identities",
    when = "September 2025 - December 2025 (Fall 2025)",
    with = "Joint PhD in Administration program (UQAM-HEC Montréal-Concordia-McGill), ESG UQAM",
    where = "Montreal, QC, Canada",
    details = c("Teaching assistant for a doctoral-level seminar on work, life, and career identities.")
  )
)

detailed_entries(data, with, when, what, where, details, .protect = FALSE)
```
